ValidationRule.description: Shows an error if the Maximum Value is set and Field Maximum Minimum Range Message is blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
OR( ISPICKVAL(Field_Type__c, "number"), ISPICKVAL(Field_Type__c, "date"), ISPICKVAL(Field_Type__c, "datetime"), ISPICKVAL(Field_Type__c, "time") ),
ISBLANK(Field_Over_Max_Range_Message__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Maximum_Value__c))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Field Over Max Range Message must be set if Maximum Value is provided.
